name: Unity of Four Elements
description:
Prince Fortem again sets out on a dangerous adventure to save his beloved, who was kidnapped by the evil Demon-Of-the-Towers, one of the lords of the Lava Kingdom. The prince is to cross impassable forests, deep dungeons, desert and snow, fight with pirates and, finally, get to the very kingdom of Love.

A magical adventure. FPS game, 3D graphics, lot of monsters and a great adventure.

WASD - Move
mouse - Aim
lbm - Shoot
rbm - Sword Attack

Kill enemyes. Collect arrays.
